gyi phyi rol tu srin mo lam pa dang phrad do/ /de'i tshe srin mo de bu lnga brgya gsar du btsas pas bkres skom gyis nyen te bde ba 'ongs par mthong nas bza' bar gzas so/ /de'i tshe bsnyen
gnas ma tshul khrims ma nyams pas srin mos mthong nas phyir skrag ste/ bsnyen gnas ma khyod khyer ba'i kha zas las cung zad cig bslang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / bsnyen gnas
mas kyang nyung du zhig byin te byin pa nyung mod kyi/ srin mo'i mthus mang du sprul pas srin mo ma smad shin tu 'grangs par gyur to/ /de nas srin mos bsnyen gnas ma la khyod kyi ming
ci zhes dris pa dang / kho mo ni/ bde ba'o/ /zhes smras so/ /'o na kho mo ma smad kyang ltogs pa las khyod kyis gsos kyi/ kho mo 'dug pa 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi phyir
log pa'i lam du khyer cig /khyod phar 'gro na kho mo'i nu mo a lam pa yang lam ga na 'dug ste khyod dang phrad kyi/ kho mo'i 'phrin du khyod bde'am/ kho mo yang bu lnga brgya bde bar
btsas so/ /zhes gyis shig /de nas bsnyen gnas ma lam du zhugs te song song ba las ring po ma lon par a lam+pa dang phrad do/ /a lam+pa la bu
mo'i 'phrin spring pa dang / bu lnga brgya bde bar btsas so/ /zhes gtam byas pas a lam+pa dga' ste/ bsnyen gnas ma la khyod kyis kho mo'i phu mo'i 'phrin dang gtam snyan byas
pa legs kyi/ kho mo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi phyir log pa'i las du khyer cig /kho mo cag gi ming po gcig kyang lam ga na 'dug gi /de dang phrad na
kho mo cag spun gnyis kyi 'phrin dang / bu lnga brgya btsas pa'i gtam yang gyis shig ces bsgo nas song ngo / /de nas yang ring por ma phyin par srin mo gnyis kyi ming po dang
phrad de| de la srin mo gnyis kyi 'phrin dang bu lnga brgya yang bde bar btsas pa'i gtam byas nas de yang rab tu dga' ste/ khyod kyis kho bo'i sring mo gnyis kyi 'phrin byas pa legs
kyi| kho bo 'dug pa'i gnas 'di na gser bum pa gang yod kyi/ phyir ldog pa'i lam du khyer cig ces bsgo'o/ /de nas bsnyen gnas ma chas te song song ba las btson
de'i drung du phyin te kha zas bsnyod nas phyir ldog pa'i lam du gser bum pa gsum yang rnyed do/ /rgyal pos kyang gser srang stong bya dgar byin pas/ bram ze dbul po
khyo shug gnyis yul de na shin tu phyug cing nor mang bar gyur pas lhag par bsod nams byed cing rin po che mang bar gyur to/ /rgyal pos kyang de bsod nams las gyur par shes
nas blon por bcug ste shin tu phyug par gyur pas/ lhag par bsod nams byed pa la dad pa'i sems skyes te sangs rgyas dang / dge 'dun spyan drangs nas mchod pa chen po byas
so| |de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pas sems rnam par grol te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/ /'khor mang po dang / kun dga' bo la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyis
gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga'o/ /bram ze mo bde ba'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// //bam po brgyad pa/ sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs
pa'i le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang
thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa'i g.yog cig dgos so/ /zhes bka' stsal pa dang /
de nas kun shes kauN+Di n+ya stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la bdag
gis bsnyen bkur yid bzhin du bgyi zhing chos gos dang lhung bzed gzung ngo / /zhes gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kauN+Di n+ya la khyod kyang rgas
'khogs te khyod nyid la yang bsnyen bkur byed pa dgos kyi/ kauN+Di n+ya khyod stan la 'dug cig ces bka' stsal to/ /de bzhin du 'od srung dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal yan
la sogs pa nye gnas lnga brgya snyed kun gyis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol na yang gcig kyang ma gnang ngo / /de nas tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pas/
bcom ldan 'das bsnyen bkur byed pa'i dge slong gang la dgyes snyam du brtags na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgyes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ khang bu brtsegs
pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba na nub phyogs kyi ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kun dga' bo la dgongs shing
dgyes par nye gnas kun gyis rtogs nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal gyi bu chen po gnyis kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste drung du phyin pa dang kun dga' bo dang
lhan cig tu yid mgu zhing dga' ba'i gtam rnam ba dum byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal ya nas tshe dang ldan pa
kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya bar dad dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyang khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya
bar dgyes te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/ /btsun pa shA ri'i bu/ bdag ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bya
bar mi dad do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni/ sgrub par dka'/ bzod par dka'o/ /'di lta ste/ me 'bar ba ni/ sgrub par dka'/ bzod par yang dka'
ba yin te/ de ltar de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang sgrub par dka'/ bzod par dka' bas na/ bdag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par
mi dad do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa mau gal ya na'i bu chen pos kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kun dga' bo/ khyod la bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing dgyes pa ni/ 'di
lta ste| khang bu brtsegs pa'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ba na nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar cing lhan pa bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyang kun
dga' bo khyod kyis bsnyen bkur bya bar dgyes kyi/ dad par gyis shig /de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur byas na/ khyod la phan pa'i don cher 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras
so| |btsun pa mau gal yan chen po/ /ci ste bdag la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur
bgyid par dad do/ /'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i na bza' bdag la 'tshal du mi stsal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das mi gsol ba'i bshos kyi lhag ma bdag
mi 'tshal ba dang / bdag dus ma mchis par bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchir gnang bar bgyi na ni/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dad do/ /de nas tshe
dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal yan chen pos tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bsnyen bkur byed du dad par byas nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa
dang / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyid par tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dad par bgyis na/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la 'dod pa 'di gsum gnang na/ gdod bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur bgyi bar zhes mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ legs so/ /mau gal ya na'i bu/ dge slong kun dga' bo de ni/ mkhas pa shes rab can te/ tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams smad pa'i tshig dang /rjes
su smad pa'i tshig gi chos phyis 'byung bar mthong bas na/ bdag la tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams 'di skad du dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ gos dang zas kyi phyir ston
pa la bsnyen bkur byed do/ /zhes smra bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir mau gal gyi bu de ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /dge slong kun dga' bo ni/ mkhas
pa shes rab can te/ dus shes shing dus rig pa lags shing / dus shes par 'gyur ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnam bzhi blta bar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang /
dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro ba'i dus la bab pa dang / dus la ma bab pa dang / gzhan yang mu stegs
can kun tu rgyu 'di dag ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la lan ldon par spobs so/ /'di dag ni/ lan ldon par mi spobs so/ /bca' ba dang bza' ba 'di ni bcom
ldan 'das la bde zhing bsod par 'gyur la/ 'di ni/ bde zhing bsod par mi 'gyur bar shes pa'i phyir te/ mau gal gyi bu/ 'di ni/ dge slong kun dga' bo'i ngo mtshar rmad
du byung ba'i chos so/ /de nas shA ri'i bu dang / mau gal gyi bu gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed par dad par byas pa dang / bcom
ldan 'das kyis kyang kun dga' bo ni/ mkhas pa shes rab can te/ dus shes shing dus rig go /zhes bsngags pas/ dge slong rnams the tshom skyes
nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /dge slong kun dga' bo 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis dus dang tshod la mkhas par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu
la bka' stsal pa/ sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol tu rgyal po chen po 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo / /
de'i tshe grong khyer pa ru da zhes bya ba na bram ze n+ya gro d+ha zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ mkhas pa/ rig pa dang ldan pa/ sman dang / gtsug lag dang / skar ma la mkhas pa zhig pas
rgyal po de'i ston pa byed de/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyang de la rgyal po chen po dang 'dra bar bsnyen bkur byed de bsgo ba'i tshig kyang nyon to/ /bram ze de phyug khyad rnam
thos kyi bu dang 'gran te/ de la bu med bas rtag tu mi dga' ste sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa las ji ltar byas na bu yod par 'gyur zhes tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang /
dbang phyug dang / nyi zla dang / skar ma dang / ri dang / chu dang / nags kyi lha kun la mchod cing rjed de lo bcu gnyis lon nas chung ma chen sems can dang ldan par gyur
to| |bud med mkhas pa dag ni/ sems can dang ldan ma thag tu bu khye'u 'am/ bu mo yin pa nges par rtogs pas/ de yang khye'u yin par shes nas bram ze la gtam smras so/ /bram
ze de de skad ces smras pa thos nas rab tu dga' mgu rangs te chung ma'i rim gro lhag par cher skyed do/ /de nas zla ba dgu tshang nas khye'u zhig btsas te gser gyi mdog can/ skra
mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa zhig go /de nas btsas ston byas nas mtshan mkhan bkug ste mtshan bltas nas ming sbyin pa chen po zhes
btags so/ /khye'u de rim gyis cher skyes nas dbyar dgun dang / ston dpyid kyi gnas kyang so sor byas te longs spyod byed du bcug go /khye'u de yang yid gzhungs shing mkhas
pa'i blo dang ldan pa zhig bas rig byed dang / gtsug lag rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs te/ sgyu rtsal gang yang mi shes pa med do/ /phyis sbyin pa chen pos pha ma la gsol pa/
bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltad mo bltar 'gro'o/ /zhes byas pa dang / de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o/ /zhes lam srang phyag dar byed du bcug ste rgyal mtshan dang / ba
dan bsgrengs nas me tog gis gtor te bdug spos kyi bdug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas sbyin pa chen po glang po rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te
dril bsgrags/ rnga brdungs/ rol mo dang / sil snyan bkrol te 'khor brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu song ngo / /yul mi thams
cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon du khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing 'di'i byin dang / gzi brjid ni/ tshangs pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes bsgrags so/ /de nas
song song ba las mu to ba dag gos hrul po gyon cing snod chag pa dag thogs te cung zad bslang ngo / /zhes 'bod pa sbyin pa chen pos thos nas de dag la khyed ci'i phyir 'di
ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/ /de la kha cig ni/ 'di skad du bdag cag la pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu smad dang / gnyen bshes ma mchis pas sdug go /zhes
zer ro| |de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te sdug go /zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom pos bcom
ste ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas mchi ma dku ste song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad cig na bshan pa dag cig
srog chags bsad nas pags pa ba shu ba dang / bsnyal gtubs pa dag mthong ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos e ma ho 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag ni/ pha mes rgyud
kyis 'di 'dri ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de la sbyin pa chen po ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod par song ngo / /de nas pha zad du
phyin pa dang zhing pa dag zhing rmos te/ zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la bya mang po dang / sbrul dag 'thu zhing za ba mthong ba dang 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag
cag ni| zhing rmos te sa glongs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na phyis mang du skyes te/ des 'tsho zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang 'bul lo/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen po de la yang ngo
mtshar du gyur nas pha zad song ba dang / rngon pa dag bya rgya bres pa dang / rnyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang / sems can dag bya rgya dang rnyis zin nas lus rdeb cing
'then kyang ma shor te snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas khyed ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las
byed pas 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste yang pha zad song ba dang / nya sa dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang du zin te thang la
phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag rgyud kyis las gzhan mi byed kyi/ 'di ltar nya bshor zhing 'tsho bar byed do//
zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ dbul phongs pas bgo ba
dang bza' ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par
'gro zhing thar pa'i dus med do snyam bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste pha la bdag gsol ba zhig mchis
kyi| gnong zhig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu/ khyod ci zer/ khyod smra ba bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /yab/ bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las mi mang po gos
dang / kha zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / rdzun dang / dbang za ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas
de dag la sbyin pa bgyid par bsams kyi/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las phongs brel pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnod zhig /phas smras pa/ ngas bang mdzod
dang / rin po che mang du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/ ci'i phyir khyod zer ba mi nyan zhes smras so/ /de nas sbyin pa chen pos phas gnang ba'i lung
thob nas yul mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen po sbyin gtong chen po byed kyi/ thams cad 'dus shing shog cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dbul zhing
phongs pa mgon med pa dang / nad pa la sogs te grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya
dang / lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad stong gi lam nas 'ongs/ kha cig ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong dang / sum stong dang / bzhi stong dang / lnga stong nas dpag tshad khri'i bar du lhags te/
de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus nas thams cad la yid bzhin du sbyin pa ni/ gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa la zas/ rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / mu sa
ra gal pa dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang / rkang 'gro la sogs te/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa byas so/ /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs
te yun ring zhig lon pa dang / bang mdzod sum cha gcig zad nas mdzod srung gis bram ze la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod nas sbyin pa byas nas sum cha gcig ni/
zad de sum gnyis las ma lus na/ phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang / tshong zong ci las bgyid dgongs shig ces smras so/ /kho bo ni/ bu 'di la byams pas ngo mi ldog gi/
bang mdzod stongs kyang bla'o/ /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas yang ring zhig lo na pa dang bang mdzod sum gnyis zad de sum cha tsam lus pa dang / mdzod
srung gis yang bram ze la/ da ni/ bang mdzod sum gnyis tsam zad de sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang / tshong zong ci las bya zhes smras so/ /bram
ze des bsgo ba/ kho bo'i bu sdug ches te ngo mi ldog pas smra mi phod kyi/ khyod bdag gis thabs ci legs su byos la brel cing mi khom pa ltar tha snyad thogs shig /mdzod srung
gis bram ze las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de don gnyer du song ngo / /de nas slong ba dag sbyin pa chen po'i thad du lhags nas bar 'ga' ni/ mdzod srung mi rnyed de
mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du mi ster bas sbyin pa chen pos 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni/ mdzod srung gis
thugs mi thub pas pha'i man ngag 'ongs kyi/ yong yang bus pha'i bang mdzod stongs par bya bar mi rigs kyi/ bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na/ rin po che yid bzhin
du rnyed de skye bo mang po la phan thogs par 'gyur ba bsams nas mi dag la 'di skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten na las ci zhig byas na/ rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed
de nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni/ zhing mang du rmos na nor dbyig mang por 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rkang 'gro spel
te spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ lam ring por tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu
rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos de dag gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gro spel ba dang / lam ring por tshong
la 'gro ba ni/ nga'i cha ma yin gyi/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha'o/ /zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam bsams te pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgya
mtsho nas rin po che mang po blangs te dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong zhig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad
ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten na dbul 'phongs pa dag ni/ blo med de/ lus dang srog dang bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do/ /khyod cis
phongs nas de lta bur sems/ khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na/ khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par byos shig /rgya mtshor ni/ 'gror mi rung ste/ rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs
dang / dba' klong 'khyil ba dang / chu srin dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can la sogs te shin tu yang ba'i bgegs
mang du yod pas thar par dka' na/ khyod cis phongs nas srog dang bsngo bar byed/ 'di la ni/ nyan pa med kyi/ ma sems par 'dug cig ces bsgo'o/ /sbyin pa chen pos de skad
ces bsgo ba thos nas bsam pa bzhin du ma grub pas yi dam bcas te/ bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa la khas bub tu nyal te mi ldang ngo snyam bsams
nas yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni/ bsam pa bzhin du ma grub kyi bar du khas bub tu nyal ba 'di las mi ldang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma mi dga' ste
gnyen bshes dang bgros nas rgya mtsho'i nang du bgegs yang ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang rmongs pa las lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod de
khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na/ nged ma dor bar zan zo zhig ces zhag gcig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar
ji skad da smras pa las ma ldog go /pha ma skrag nas yang 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam gyi bar du bya ba brtsams pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi
gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na brgya la phyir ldog kyang srid kyi/ ma btang na zhag bdun lon na 'phral du bye brag 'bye ste/ da ni/ gtang dgos so snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste lag
pa nas bzung nas bu longs la zan zo zhig /yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen po yang langs te bza' ba zos/ btang ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi
rol tu byung ste mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyed su 'gror dga' ba rnams dang 'grogs te 'dong gi/ de dad pon yang kho bos bya la yo byed kyang kho bos sbyar
ro| |zhes bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe mi lnga brgya tsam yang 'gro bar khas blangs nas so so nas yo byad sbyar te nam 'gro ba'i dus kyang byas nas dus bzhin du lam du zhugs te chos so/ /
lam du 'jug pa'i tshe khye'u'i pha ma dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang / blon po la sogs te yul mi thams cad kyis kyang bskyal nas rdzongs bstabs so/ /pha mas kyang ngus te phyi phyag byas
nas zhag du ma'i lam 'das pa dang / 'brog stong du phyin te nub mo dgong ma la du mi rgod kyis bcom nas nor rdzas kun 'phrog go /de nas song song ba la grong khyer shu pa ra zhes
bya bar phyin nas grong khyer de na bram ze ka pi li zhes bya ba dang phrad de/ bram ze de'i khyim du song nas bram ze de las sbyin pa chen pos gser srang sum stong bslang bar byas so/ /
de'i tshe na bram ze de la bu mo gser gyi mdog can/ skra mthon mthing khar 'dug pa/ rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyed kyi rgyal bu thams cad kyis
bslangs na yang ma ster ba zhig yod de/ de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po bram ze de'i sgor song ste bram ze ka pi li 'dug gam zhes dris pa'i tshe bu mos khyim gyi nang nas sbyin pa chen po'i
skad thos pa tsam gyis sgo phyi na skad grag pa 'di kho mo'i khyim thab yin no/ /zhes pha ma la smras so/ /de nas bram ze sgor byung nas phrad pa dang / khye'u de la 'di ni/ nges par gzhan
bas 'phags so snyam bsams so/ /khye'u des gser bslangs pa dang / bram zes kyang sbyin par gnang nas lag pa ya gcig tu ni/ gser thogs/ lag pa ya gcig gis bu mo
khrid de| bu mo 'di yang khyod kyi chung mar sbyin gyi/ longs shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ bdag ni/ rgya mtsho chen por rin po che len du 'gro ste/ rgya
mtsho'i nang na bgegs shin tu mang bas kho bo 'khor tam mi 'khor gyi gtol med de/ khyod kyi bu mo chung mar len pa'i thugs mi thub bo/ /bram zes smras pa/ khyod bde
bar 'khor na bu mo 'di chung mar longs shig ces smras pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos kyang phyir 'khor na de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas bram zes kyang gser srang sum
stong dang / gzhan yang yo byad ci dgos pa kun sbyar te/ de nas chas pas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin to/ /de nas gru bcos te gru'i nang du zhugs nas de nas thag pa bdun gyis
brtod de gru'i nang nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs 'di dag yod de/ 'di lta ste/ rlung nag po dang / srin po dang / chu'i dba' rlabs 'khyil pa dang / klu
gdug pa dang / chu'i mdog lta bu'i ri dang / chu srin la sogs pa'i bgegs yang ba mang du yod kyi/ khyed las 'gror mi dad pa zhig yod na 'di las phyir log cig/ /phyis
'gyod par gyur ta re/ gal te lus dang srog la mi lta ste/ pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen bshes la mi chags na 'dong ngo / /gal te bde bar phyin na/
rin po che sna bdun gyis bu tsha rabs bdun tshun chad phyug par 'gyur te/ longs spyod zad mi shes par 'gyur ro/ /zhes smras nas thag pa gcig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi
ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad sgras nas rtod thag re re bcad de rlung dang sbyar te g.yor shing bsgreng bas mgyogs khyod mda' bzhin song ngo / /de nas tshong ba dag
dang rin po che'i gling du phyin nas sbyin pa chen po mang du thos pas rin po che brtag pa la yang shin tu mkhas te/ rin po che bzang ngan dang / lci yang dang / ji tsam ri ba'i rin thang
phan tshun tshong pa rnams la bstan nas rin po che kha ngog 'di lta bu ni/ yang mod kyi/ rin che'o/ /rin po che 'di dag ni/ lci yang rin chung gi /ma
len cig /ha cang yang mang ches na gru lci bas 'bying ngo / /ha cang nyung ches na yang nyon mongs te song song ba'i don med pas/ 'di tsam zhig ni/ ran no/ /zhes bya ba la sogs
pa'i tshod kyang bstan nas rin po che grur brdzangs te ci la yang ma rag nas da phyir 'dong ngo / /zhes chas pa dang / sbyin pa chen po gru'i nang du 'ong du ma btub nas tshong pa rnams
la kho bo ni/ klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ma thob kyi bar du mi ldog go /zhes smras so/ /de nas tshong pa rnams kyis dus te mya ngan gyis yi mug
nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag tshong pa 'di rnams ni/ skyes bu ded dpon khyod kyi g.yog tu 'ongs te/ da khyod kyis 'dir dor to mi 'gro na bdag cag kyang phyir khyim
du mi phyin te/ thams cad 'khyams par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa chen pos smras pa/ tshong pa khyed cag mi nyes par yul du phyin par kho bos kyang smon lam gdab bo/ /zhes bog
por lag tu blangs te phyogs bzhir mchod nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rin po che blangs te sems can phongs pa la spyin par ma zad kyi/ de ltar sbyin pa byed
pa'i bsod nams des sangs rgyas su 'grub pa'i phyir ro/ /bdag gis smras pa 'di bden te smon lam bzhin du 'grub na/ tshong pa 'di dag rin po che dang bcas pa nye zhe med par
'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar phyin par shog cig ces smon lam btab nas thag pa bcad de g.yor shing bsgrengs nas phyir 'dzam bu'i gling du bde bar dong ngo / /de dag song ba'i
'og tu sbyin pa chen po chur zhugs te song ba las zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ pus mo tsam las ma nub bo/ /de nas yang zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ brla drung tsam las ma nub
bo/ |de nas yang zhag bdun song ba las rked pa tsam las ma nub bo/ /zhag bdun lon gyi bar du ni/ phrag pa tsam du phyin to/ /de nas zhag bdun gyi bar du ni/ rkyal lo/ /de nas
ri zhig gi drung du phyin pa dang shing la 'jus te ri la 'dzegs nas zhag bdun gyis rtse mor phyin to/ /ri rtser zhag bdun song song nas yang zhag bdun gyis shod du chu 'gram du
phyin to| |chu 'gram du phyin pa dang chu'i nang na pad+ma gser gyi mdog can yod pa la sbrul gdug pas pad+ma'i rtsa ba la dkris shing 'dug pa mthong ngo / /de nas byang chub sems dpa'
skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ sbrul gdug pa 'di dag kyang sngon zhe sdang dang / phrag dog byas pa'i rkyen gyis 'di lta
bu'i lus mi sdug pa myong ngo snyam lhag par de la snying brtse ba'i sems skyes pas sbrul gdug pa de'i gdug pa kun zhi nas byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma
de'i steng nas gom pa dor te song song ba las zhag bdun gyis sprul gdug pa de dag las brtol to/ /de nas yang song song ba las srin po dang phrad nas srin po de dag mi'i dri tshor
bas kun tu tshol lo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig tu byams pa'i sems kyis brtags pas srin po de dag 'jam pa'i tshig gis skyes bu khyod gang nas 'ongs/
gang du 'gro zhes dris so/ /de la sbyin pa chen pos kho bo ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che tshol du 'ongs so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas srin po de dag rab tu dga' ste/ 'di ni/
bsod nams chen po dang ldan pa zhig snyam bsams nas 'di ni/ da dung klu'i pho brang las shin tu ring ste nam yang mi phyin pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi/ mthu zhig bstangs
te bskyal lo snyam nas nam mkha' la khyer te dpag tshad bzhi brgya'i pha rol tu phyin nas phyir yang sa la bzhag go /sbyin pa chen po de nas yang song song ba las ring po ma lon
par dngul gyi mkhar zhig mthong nas klu'i gnas yin no snyam bsams te nye bar song ngo / /mkhar de'i phyi rol 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul
gdug pa 'jigs su rung bas gang ngo / /sbyin pa chen pos de dag mthong nas sbrul gdug pa 'di dag ni/ sngon zhe sdang che ba'i lan gyis 'di lta bu'i lus 'jigs su rung ba
myong bar gyur to snyam ste/ de la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar byams shing snying rje ba'i sems skyes te/ de ltar byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sprul gyi gdug pa yang zhi bar gyur
nas sprul de dag brdzis te klu'i mkhar du song ngo / /mkhar de la klu gnyis kyis dkris te klu'i mgo mkhar sgo la bstan to/ /klu de gnyis kyis sbyin pa chen po mthong nas mgo bteg
ste gdug pa 'byin pa las sbyin pa chen po byams pa'i sems bskyed pas/ gdug pa yang zhi nas mgo smad de nyal lo/ /sbyin pa chen pos klu'i mgo la brdzis nas mkhar gyi
nang du song ba dang / mkhar gyi nang na klu zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pa mthong ngo / /klu'i rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba dang sdangs te
'di snyam du bsams so/ /nga'i gnas 'di 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas/ klu dang / gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan gang
yang 'dir 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub na/ 'di lta bu su zhig yin snyam ste 'dug pa las langs nas bsu ste bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i khri la bzhag ste
kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs byin no/ /kha zas zos nas khyod 'dir ci la 'ongs/ ji ltar phyin ces dris so/ /byang chub sems dpas smras pa/
'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag ni/ dbul phongs pas nor dang gos dang zas kyi phyir gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/ tshe 'phos ma thag
tu ngan song gsum du ltung ngo / /bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ste de dag gi mgon bya ba'i phyir lam ring po nas nyon mongs pa dang bsngos te rgyal po chen po khyod la nor
bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches sems can la phan gdags pa'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal gyi/ bdag
gis yid dang mi 'gal bar rin po che stsal bar gsol/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ shin tu yang rnyed dka' ba yin te/ khyod don
'di'i phyir 'ongs na 'dir zla ba gcig cig 'dug ste/ bdag gis mchod pa cung zad bzhes la bdag cag la chos kyang bstan na/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che
yang sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos nyin gcig bzhin du kha zas ro brgya dang
ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mos byang chub sems dpa' la mchod do/ /byang chub sems dpas kyang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i chos kyi yan lag
zla ba gcig gi bar tu bstan nas phyir 'gro'o/ /zhes byas pa dang / klu'i rgyal po dga' nas spyi bo'i gtsug phud las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul lo/ /skyes
bu chen po 'gro ba la phan pa'i don du yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas mchog tu
gyur cig ces smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal po la nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ci yod ces dris na/ smras pa/ nor bu 'di ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong khor khor yug tu
dgos pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs nus so/ /byang chub sems dpas bsam pa/ nor bu rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ 'on kyang bdag gis bsam pa'i don
chen po sgrub nus pa ma yin no bsams nas klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal te song ngo / /de nas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas bai DUR+ya sngon po'i mkhar zhig
mthong ngo / /mkhar de 'dod pas song ba dang mkhar de'i drung du phyin pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su
gang ngo / /byang chub sems dpas sbrul gdug pa de dag la snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas sbrul de dag la brdzis
pa song ngo / /mkhar sgor phyin pa dang klu gnyis shig mkhar sgo na nyal ba yang byang chub sems dpa' snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems kyis klu'i gdug pa zhi nas mgo la
brdzis te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo / /de'i tshe mkhar de na klu'i rgyal po zhig rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang na 'dug pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas
'di snyam du bdag gi gnas 'di la 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma yin pa gzhan su yang 'ong ba'i thugs
mi thub na/ mi 'di lta bu su yin/ gang nas 'ongs snyam ste ya mtshan du gyur nas bsu ste bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byas nas rin po che'i gdan la bzhag go /de nas kha
zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas byang chub sems dpas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod 'dir ci las 'ongs/ don ci yod ces dris so/ /byang chub
sems dpas smras pa/ bdag ni/ rgyal po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klus smras pa/ rin po che ni/ shin tu yang rnyed par dka' ste/
khyod 'dod pa yang dag na/ kho bos gsol ba bzhin du zla ba gnyis shig 'dir 'dug ste/ bdag cag la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pas bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes
na| nor bu rin po che yang sbyin no/ /zhes byas pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas klu'i rgyal pos zla ba gnyis kyi bar du kha zas ro brgya dang
ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mo sna tshogs kyis mchod de byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i chos kyi rnam grangs zla ba gnyis kyi
bar du bstan te phyir 'gro bar bsams nas klu'i rgyal pos kyang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te phul nas skyes bu chen po yi dam la shin tu brtan pa khyod gdon mi
za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang khyod kyi nye gnas bgyi'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/ /nor bu rin po che 'di la
mthu stobs ci yod ces dris na/ nor bu 'di ni/ dpag tshad bzhi stong kho ra khor yug tu ci 'dod pa thams cad char bzhin du 'bebs so/ /zhes smras so/ /byang chub sems
dpa' yang 'di snyam du rin po che 'di mthu stobs che mod kyi/ bdag gi bsam pa sgrub nus pa ma yin no/ /snyam nas klu'i rgyal pos mkhar gyi sgo'i phyi rol tu byang chub sems
dpa' bskyal to/ /de nas yang song song ba las rgyang ma nas gser gyi mkhar rab tu 'tsher ba zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i drung du
song nas phyin pa dang / mkhar de yang 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas yongs su gang ba mthong ngo / /byang chub sems dpa' yang
byams pa'i sems bskyed pas sbrul gyi gdug pa zhi nas de la brdzis te song ngo / /mkhar de la'ang klu gnyis shig 'khyil te mgo sgo'i phyi rol tu bstan nas nyal ba/ byang chub
sems dpa' mthong nas mgo bteg ste gdug pa 'byin pa las byang chub sems dpas snying brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed pas gdug pa zhi nas de'i mgo la brdzis
te mkhar gyi nang du song ngo / /mkhar de'i nang na klu'i rgyal pos rin po che'i gzhal med khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rgyang ma nas mthong ste 'di snyam du bdag gi gnas
'di ni| 'obs rim pa bdun gyis bskor te/ 'obs kyi nang na sbrul gdug pas gang bas klu dang gnod sbyin ma gtogs par gzhan gang yang 'ong ba'i thugs mi thub
na| mi 'di su yin/ gang nas 'ongs snyam ngo mtshar du bzung ste rgyang ma nas bsu nas bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te rin po che'i gdan la 'dug tu bcug
go /de nas kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas kha zas zos pa'i 'og tu khyod su zhig /gang nas 'ongs zhes dris so/ /de la byang chub sems dpas bdag
ni| 'dzam bu'i gling nas mchis te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag bsod nams chung bas/ nor dang zas dang skom gyi phyir gcig la gcig rnam pa sna tshogs pas
'tsho zhing gsod de/ mi dge ba bcu'i las rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung zhing sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/ bdag ni/ de dag
la snying brtse ste mgon bya ba'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyod la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che slong du 'ongs so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni/ rnyed
par sla ba ma yin te/ skyes bu khyod bdag la re ste 'ongs na/ bdag gi gnas 'dir zla ba bzhi zhig 'dug ste bdag cag gi mchod pa bzhes na/ nor bu rin po che yang
dbul lo/ /zhes byas pa dang / byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du bgyi'o/ /zhes smras nas/ klu'i rgyal pos zla ba bzhi'i bar du kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa
sna tshogs sbyar te phul nas rol mo mang pos kyang mchod do/ /de la byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher phye zhing bstan pas klu'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ste klu
gzhan dang / gnod sbyin gzhan la mi ltos par yo byad thams cad kyang yid bzhin du sbyar to/ /de lta bu'i tshul du zla ba bzhi byas nas byang chub
sems dpa' 'gro bar chas pa dang / klu'i rgyal pos gtsug phud nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bkrol te byang chub sems dpa' la phul nas skyes bu chen po yi dam la
brtan pa khyod gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o/ /nam mngon par sangs rgyas pa na bdag kyang nye gnas mchog tu gyur te bsnyen bkur byed par shog cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /
byang chub sems dpas kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas nor bu rin po che 'di la mthu stobs ji tsam zhig yod ces dris so/ /klu'i rgyal pos smras pa/ nor bu rin po che
'di ni| dpag tshad brgyad stong khor khor yug tu rin po che char bzhin du 'bebs te/ ci 'dod pa thams cad 'bebs so/ /zhes smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
gdod dga' nas 'di snyam du 'dzam bu gling gi sa khyon ni/ dpag tshad bdun stong las med de/ nor bu rin po che 'dis ni/ bdag gi re ba skong ngo snyam bsams nas snga
phyir rnyed pa'i rin po che gsum char gos kyi mtha' mar phur te mkhar gyi sgor byung ba dang / klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bskyal nas so sor dong ngo / /byang chub
sems dpas pha zad cig tu phyin nas nor bu rin po che rnams lag tu thogs nas 'di skad ces smon lam btab bo/ /nor bu 'di yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag
na| bdag nam mkha' la 'phur bar gyur cig ces smras so/ /de skad ces smras ma thag tu nam mkha' la 'phur te rgya mtsho'i bgegs las thar nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin
par gyur te/ de na cung zad bsti zhing ngal sos pa'i mal du gnyid kyis log pa dang / de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i klu bran rnams 'di skad ces bgros so/ /rgya mtsho 'di na nor bu rin po che
'di gsum las med de/ gsum char mi 'dis khyer gyi/ nor bu 'di ni/ yon tan dang ldan pas bdag cag la yang dgos kyi phyir brku'o/ /zhes bgros nas byang chub sems
dpa' gnyid kyis log pa'i tshe yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che klu rnams kyis phyir brkus so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sad nas bltas na/ nor bu rin po che med pas 'di snyam
du bsams so/ /'ad ni/ gdon mi za bar rgya mtsho'i klus brkus kyi/ bdag gis mthu ci yod pas rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te bskam par bya'o snyam bsams te nor bu phyir ma
thob kyi bar du lag pa stong par phyir mi 'gro'o snyam yi dam bcas nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su song ste rus sbal gyi khog pa zhig blangs nas lag pa gnyis kyis rgya mtsho'i chu bcus
so| |de'i tshe na rgya mtsho'i lhas de'i bsam pa shes nas de la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho 'di ni/ gting zab cing yangs te/ dpag tshad stong
phrag sum brgya sum cu yod pa/ gal te 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad log kyang rgya mtsho skam par byed mi nus na/ khyod gcig pus nus pa lta ci smos te/ don med do/ /
byang chub sems dpas smras pa/ mi gcig gi snying nas las byas na/ ci yang mi 'grub pa med de/ bdag gi rin po che rnyed pa des 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde
ba bya bar bsams te/ de'i bsod nams kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la sems ma zhum na/ ci'i phyir rgya mtsho 'di skam par mi nus zhes smras so/ /de'i
tshe na lha khyab 'jug la sogs pas rgyang ma nas byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu lus yid mthun par rgya mtsho'i chu bcus te 'gro ba mang pos don du dka' ba byed pa mthong
nas de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' la bstang ngo snyam bsams te gcig nas gcig tu sbran nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i drung du lhags te/ byang chub sems
dpa' snod kyis chu 'chu ba mthong nas lha de dag thams cad so so'i gos phud de chur smyugs nas lan gcig smyugs te phyir phyung bas/ rgya mtsho'i chu dpag tshad bzhi bcu
bri'o| |yang lan gnyis smyugs pas dpag tshad brgyad cu bri'o/ /lan gsum smyugs pas dpag tshad brgya nyi shu bri nas klu de dag 'jigs skrag ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i drung
du lhags nas 'di skad du thong zhig /rgya mtsho'i chu skam par ma byed cig ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpas btang ngo / /de nas klu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'
la khyod kyi nor bu rin po che 'di ci zhig tu dgos/ smras pa/ sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos so/ /glus smras pa/ sems can la phan pa'i don du dgos na/ rgya mtsho'i
nang na yang sems can mang du yod na/ ci'i phyir bskur zhes smras so/ /smras pa/ rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa yang sems can yin mod kyi/ de la phongs pa'i sdug bsngal
med do| |'dzam bu gling gi sems can dag ni/ nor gyi phyir gcig gis gcig la rnam par 'tshe zhing gnod pa byed de/ mi dge ba bcu rdzogs par byed pas tshe 'phos nas
kun sems can dmyal bar skye ste/ bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rin po che 'di dgos so/ /zhes smras pa dang / klu rnams kyis nor bu rin po che phyung ste slar phul
lo| |rgya mtsho'i lhas byang chub sems dpa' do ltar brtson 'grus la brtan pa mthong nas 'di ni/ gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya'o snyam sems te/ nam mngon par sangs rgyas
pa na bdag kyang nye gnas kyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpas rin po che phyir thob nas steng gi nam
mkha' la 'phur te gnas su 'ongs nas sngar gyi tshong pa grogs po rnams yod dam/ bde bar phyin tam zhes dris so/ /tshong pa grogs po dag bde bar phyin nas de
dag gcig la gcig dga' nas grogs po rnams kyis ngo mtshar ya mtshan du bzung ngo / /de nas bram ze ka pi li'i sgor song nas byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho nas
phyir log go /zhes thos nas thams cad kyis sgor bsu ste rab tu dga' nas tshong ba grogs po rnams dang bcas pa la dga' ston chen po byas so/ /de'i tshe byang chub
sems dpas rin po che thogs te khyim du 'ongs pa dang / bram ze de'i bang mdzod thams cad yongs su gang bar gyur to/ /de nas bram ze ka pi lis rin po che sna tshogs
kyis bu mo brgyan nas rin po che'i chu snod bskur te byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang rkang lag bkrus nas bu mo'i lag pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa' la
gtad| byang chub sems dpas kyang bzhes nas bram ze rab tu dga' ste bu mo'i g.yog tu bu mo lnga brgya dang / glang po che lnga brgya yang rin po ches brgyan te rol mo
byas nas byang chub sems dpa' la brdzangs so/ /de'i tshe na sbyin pa chen po'i pha ma bu dang dral ba'i 'og tu rtag tu dus pas/ pha ma gnyis ka'i mig ldongs par gyur te/
bu rgya mtsho nas log pa dang pha ma phrad nas bus pha ma la phyag 'tshal te lag pa nas 'jus te bu yin par rtogs so/ /sbyin pa chen po/ khyod kyis nged por te song ba'i
'og tu mig kyang ldongs so/ /khyod rgya mtshor song song nas ci rnyed ces dris pa dang / sbyin pa chen pos nor bu rin po che pa'i lag tu byin te/ bdag gis 'di rnyed do/ /
zhes smras nas phas lag tu blangs te bsnams nas 'di lta bu'i rdo ba ni/ nga'i mdzod na sngon yang mang du yod na/ 'di ltar nyon mongs pa dang bsdo ci dgos zhes smras
so| |de nas byang chub sems dpas nor bu phyir blangs te pha ma'i mig phyis pa tsam gyis ji ltar rlung drag pos sprin bus pa bzhin du pha ma gnyis kyi mig kyang sngar bas
gsal bar mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas pha ma gnyis dga' ste/ 'di ni/ nor bu rin po che yin yang dag pa lta ste/ nyon mongs pa'i don yod par gyur to zhes smras
so| |de nas yang sbyin pa chen pos rin po che thogs te/ khyod yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin yang dag na/ kho bo'i pha ma'i 'og tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gdan 'byung
zhing / rin po che'i bla res steng khebs par shog cig ces smon lam btab ma thag tu de bzhin du grub nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod thams cad kyang
gang bar gyur to/ /de nas rgyal pos pho nya zhig glang po che dpag tshad brgya stong du 'gro ba zhig la bskyon te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi thams cad la sbyin pa chen pos rgya mtsho
nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rnyed de/ nor bu yon tan can des da ste zhag bdun na rin po che la sogs pa gos dang / zas dang / dgos pa'i yon tan thams
cad char bzhin du 'bebs kyi/ so so nas ci bder longs shig ces bsgrags so/ /de ltar kun du bsgrags nas sbyin pa chen po khrus byas te gos gsar pa bgos
nas ga la'i thung bu mnyam por rgyal mtshan btsugs te yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags nas bog phor lag tu blangs nas 'di skad ces
smon lam btab bo/ /'dzam bu gling gi mi dag ni/ dbul phongs pa sha stag ste/ de dag la phan gdags dgos kyi/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin te mi rdzun na/
so so nas ci dang ci dgos pa de dang de dag thams cad yid bzhin du char ltar phob cig ces smras ma thag tu phyogs bzhi nas rlung nag po g.yos nas de ma thag tu mi
gtsang ba'i nyal nyil thams cad phyags te char zim bu mi drag pa zhig bab nas rdul mi 'thul bar byas pa'i 'og tu thog mar bza' ba dang / btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa rnam pa sna
tshogs char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas 'bru rnams char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas gos char bzhin du bab bo/ /de nas rin po che char bzhin du bab ste/ 'dzam bu'i gling ni/ rin po
che'i phung pos yongs su gang nas rin po che dag sog ma'am/ gyo mo lta bur byas te byang chub sems dpas de ltar kun chog par byas nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la 'di skad
zhes bsgo'o/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can dag ni/ gos dang / zas dang / nor gyi phyir gcig la gcig gsod cing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pas sdig pa mi dge ba'i
chos 'ba' zhig byed de/ tshe'i dus byas nas ngan song gsum du lhung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro bas bdag ni/ de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir rgya mtsho'i bgegs dang / nyon mongs
pa mang du khyed du bsad de/ khyed rnams bde bar bya ba'i phyir rgya mtsho nas nor bu rin po che dag blangs nas da khyed kun cis kyang mi brel te bde bar gyur gyi/ khyed rnams dge ba
bcu'i las kyi lam la lus dang / ngag dang / yid bsdus te brtson par gyis shig ces thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas bstan cing bskul to/ /de ltar bstan cing bskul te
dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed du bcug pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag tshe 'phos nas mtho ris gyi lhar skyes so/ /de'i tshe de'i dus
na de'i pha bram ze n+ya gro d+ha ni/ da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /de'i mar gyur pa ni/ da ltar nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/ /sbyin pa chen po ni/ nga nyid yin no/ /dngul gyi
mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ shA ri'i bu yin no/ /bai DUR+ya'i mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ mau gal yan yin no/ /gser gyi mkhar na 'dug pa'i klu de ni/ kun dga' bo
yin no| |rgya mtsho'i lha de ni/ ma 'gags pa yin no/ /kun dga' bo 'di klu'i rgyal po byed pa na yang nga la bsnyen bkur byas te dus la mkhas/ da ltar gyi bar du yang dus
la mkhas kyi/ 'dod pa gsum yang yid bzhin du gnang ngo / /zhes bka' stsal pa dang / kun dga' bo dga' mgu rangs nas pus mo'i lha ngas sa la btsugs te bdag gis
nam mtsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas 'khor mang po rnams la la ni/
rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i bar du thob po/ /la la ni/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur/ la la ni/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
do| |la la ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob nas rjes su yi rang ste mngon par dga'o/ /sbyin pa chen po rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// //rgyal po me long
gdong gi le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab n+ya gro d+ha'i tshal na bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang / brgya
byin la sogs pas bskor cing bzhugs pa las/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshon dang / dpe byad dang / gser gyi mdog lta bu'i sku la 'khor mang po thams cad ngo mtshar du
'dzin te bstod cing bsngags so/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po las 'phags te thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur pas/ dge slong dag the tshom du gyur nas
bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da ltar 'di 'ba' zhig tu 'khor kun las 'phags te/ mchog gtso bor gyur pa ma yin gyi/ sngon
'das pa'i dus na yang 'di dag kun las 'phags te gtso bor gyur to/ /de nas dge slong dag gis sngon ji ltar gtso bor gyur pa bstan par gsol pa dang de la bcom
ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal
po chen po rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong la dbang byed pa zhig byung ste/ de la bu ni/ lnga brgya yod do/ /dus phyi zhig na btsun mo la bu zhig btsas te/ lus
gser gyi kha dog can skra mthon mthing lta bu lag mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan yod pa/ rkang pa g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa/ rkang pa g.yas kyis
mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa/ bsod nams dang mtshan du ldan pa zhig btsas te/ ming yang me long gdong zhes bya bar btags so/ /rgyal po chen po de nad kyis btab
ste tshe'i dus byed du nye ba na blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang na rgyal tshab tu gang gzhug /rgyal po'i dbang gang la bskur zhes zhus pa dang / rgyal po des yon tan
dang mtshan rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ rgyal por chug la dbang skur cig ces bsgo'o/ /bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lhas kyi mdog gser lta bu la skra mthon mthing du
'dug pa dang / lag pa gnyis kyi mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa dang / rkang pa g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa dang / rkang pa g.yon pa'i mthil na rta'i
ri mo yod pa dang / rgyal po'i gos gon na lus dang 'tsham zhing mi che mi chung ba dang / rgyal po'i stan la 'dug na gzi brjid dang mthur ldan pa dang / rgyal phran rnams
kyis bkur sti rim gro cher byed de/ btsun mo dang / pho brang slas rnams kyang de la dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang / lha rnams kyi rten du khrid na lha rnams kyis phyir phyag byed pa dang /
yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing thams cad kyi yid tshim par byed pa dang / btsun mo chen mo las btsas pa dang bcu ste/ yon tan
'di dag dang ldan na/ rgyal por dbang skur cig ces bsgos nas mi rtag pa mngon sum du gyur te tshe 'phos so/ /de nas rgyal bu dang blon po rnams 'dus te rgyal bu'i nor gi tshe ba
nas bsngar gyis yon tan bcu gang la yod pa brtags na/ rgyal bu gzhan thams cad ni/ lus gser lta bu'i mdog can ma yin/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa ma yin/ lag pa'i
mthil na 'khor lo'i mtshan yod pa ma yin/ rkang ba'i mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yod pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gos dang 'tsham pa ma yin/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na sdangs
pa ltar 'greng bar gyur/ rgyal phran dang blon po rnams bsti stang dang phyag mi byed de/ btsun mo dang pho brang slas rnams dga' ba dang phyag bya ba ma yin/ lha'i rten du khrid na lha
rnams kyis phyag bya ba ma yin/ rin po che'i char 'bebs par nus pa ma yin/ btsun mo chen mo'i sras kyang ma yin te/ rgyal bu lnga brgya las mtshan gcig tsam dang ldan pa
'ga' yang ma byung ste/ sras kyi nang gi tha chung 'ba' zhig lus gser gyi mdog can la/ skra mthon mthing gi mdog lta bu/ lag pa gnyis 'khor
lo'i mtshan dang yang ldan/ rkang pa'i mthil na glang po che dang rta'i ri mo yang yod/ gos dang lus su 'tsham/ rgyal po'i gdan la bzhag na gzi brjid dang byin che/ rgyal phran
thams cad kyis bsti stang dang bcas pas phyag byed cing / btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang dga' bas phyag byed/ lha'i rten du 'ongs na lha rnams phyag byed/ rin po che phob cig
ces smras ma thag tu char bzhin du 'bab/ btsun mo'i nang gi chen mo las btsas te/ mtshan rdzogs par ldan pas rgyal phran dang / blon po rnams kyis rgyal por dbang
bskur te/ tshes bco lnga'i nang bar nyi ma thog mar shar ba na gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ che khyad dpag tshad gcig pa/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs te de la
pus mo btsugs nas gal te bdag yon tan dang ldan te rgyal por 'gyur na/ 'khor lo 'di bdag gi drung du nye bar shog cig ces smras pa dang / nam mkha'i phyogs nas
nye bar 'ongs so/ /glang po rin po che ni/ ri spos kyi ngad can nas 'ongs te mjug ma la nor \?\ bus brgyan pa/ rgyal po de la zhon nas nam mkha' la 'phur te/ nyi ma phyed kyis
gling bzhi nas 'khor to/ /gal te rkang pas 'gro na rkang pa'i rjes gar reg par gser gyi bye mar 'gyur ro/ /rta rin po che ni/ kha dog mthing ga la rnga rdog dmar ba/ rin po che sna bdun
'bab pa/ rgyal po de la zhon na/ zan gcig bza' ran tsam gyis gling bzhi nas 'khor te/ mi ngal mi dub bo/ /nor bu rin po che ni/ 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te/ rgyang
grags brgya nyi shu tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byed la/ rin po che sna bdun char bzhin du 'bab cing thams cad la sbyin par byed do/ /bud med rin po che ni/ bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
rgyal po'i yid tshim par byed do/ /khyim bdag rin po che ni/ rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun ci dgos pa yid bzhin du sbyar te/ zad mi shes par byed do/ /blon po rin po che ni/ rgyal po
la dpung rnam bzhi dgos na/ bltas pa tsam gyis dpung gi tshogs rnams 'dus te/ rtsal dang mthur ldan no/ /de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas de 'di snyam du sems so/ /
thabs 'di lta bu thob pa yang sngon gyi bsod nams las skyes kyi/ rgyal po'i gdung rgyud mi 'chad par bya'o snyam bsams nas spos chus khrus byas te/ gos gsar pa gtsangs
bgos nas lag na bog phor thogs te shar phyogs logs su pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'di skad ces smras so/ /shar phyogs na skyes bu 'phags pa bzhugs pa rnams bdag
gsol ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol zhes smras pa dang / shar phyogs nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/ /lho dang
nub dang / byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du gsol pa dang / de dag kyang so so nas rang sangs rgyas nyi khri snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs so/ /de nas rgyal po dang / blon po
rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar te mchod pa byas so/ /de nas rgyal phran brgyad khri bzhi stong snyeng phyir yul du 'gro bar gsol te phyi phyag 'tshal ba na/ rgyal phran rnams
kyis 'phags pa rnams la shas kyis bdag cag kyang mchod par 'tshal te/ bsod nams bgyi'o/ /zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal po dang / blon po rnams kyis lo brgyad khri
bzhi stong gi bar du rang sangs rgyas brgyad khri la yid bzhin du mchod nas tshe'i dus byas pa dang / mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so/ /dge slong dag /de'i tshe rgyal po me long gdong
de ni/ da ltar nga yin no/ /rgyal po de'i pha ni/ nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /btsun mo chen mo de ni/ nga'i yum lha mdzes yin no/ /rgyal bu lnga brgya ni/ shAkya'i rigs
lnga brgya yin no/ /de'i tshe na yang thams cad kyi mchog gtso bor gyur te da sangs rgyas nas kyang mtshan dang ldan pa'i mchog gtso bor gyur to/ /'khor mang po rnams sangs
rgyas kyis gsungs pa la rjes su yi rang nas mngon par dga'o/ /rgyal po me long gdong gi le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// //bam po dgu pa/ legs tshol dang
nyes tshol gyi le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na
bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe na lha sbyin rab tu byung mod kyi/ rnyed pa la chags pas mtshams med pa'i las kyis ri bsnyil nas sangs rgyas mnan pa dang / zhabs la shing gi tshal pa
'jugs pa dang / glang po che smyon pa btang ba dang / mthun pa'i dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang / zag pa zad pa'i dge slong ma bsad pa dang / mi dge ba'i las 'di dag byas nas
skye ba phyi ma'i rnam par smin pas 'jigs te mu stegs can gyi ston pa drug gi thad du song nas dris so/ /ston pa drug gis kyang ngan par lta ba'i chos sdig pa byas kyang sdig par mi
'gyur la/ dge ba byas kyang bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba'i chos bstan nas de la yid ches te dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad do/ /de'i tshe na kun dga' bos phu nu bo la snying brtse ba'i phyir
rab tu mi dga' ste dus nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lhas sbyin gti mug can ni/ mi dge ba'i las kha na ma thob bgyis te dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad nas
shAkya'i rigs rnams kyang sun 'byin par bgyis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ lha sbyin 'di ni/ tshe 'di 'ba' zhig
la rnyed pa dang grags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad par ma zad kyi/ 'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang / grags pa'i phyir lus dang srog kyang stor ba'i las byas so/ /dge
slong dag the tshom du gyur nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha sbyin gyis 'das pa'i dus na yang rnyed pa dang grags pa'i slad du lus dang
srog stor ba'i las bgyis pa ji lta bu lags zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo/ sngon 'das pa'i dus na
bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul wa ra Na si na bram ze ha yi zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ des rigs mnyam
pa las chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon par chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te zla ba dgu tshang ba na bu khye'u zhig btsas so/ /de nas btsas ston chen po byas nas
bu'i ming yang legs tshol zhes bya bar btags te ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/ /de nas yang sems can dang ldan par gyur te/ sngon ma de mnyen zhing des pa las/
sems can dang ldan pa'i 'og tu gtum zhing khro bar gyur to/ /de nas zla ba tshang ba dang khye'u zhig btsas te/ de ltar ma yang sngon las gyur pas/ bu'i ming yang nyes chol zhes bya
bar btags te ma ma la gtad nas gsos so/ /khye'u spun gnyis phyis cher skyes nas spun gnyis rgya mtshor rin po che len par dad de so so nas 'khor dang grogs lnga brgya lnga
brgya rnyed nas snga phyir lam du zhugs so/ /lam ring bas na zhag bdun gyi gnas su ma phyin par rgyags chad de srog dang bral du nye nas legs tshol dang grogs tshong pa grogs po
rnams nyam thag ste/ thams cad lha rjed cing lha rnams la mchod pa byed do/ /de nas 'brog stong de na rgyang ma nas skyed shing bzang po zhig mthong nas thams cad skyed shing drung du lhags
pa dang / shing gi drung na chu mig bzang po zhig kyang yod de/ tshong pa rnams chu mig de la 'thungs nas bdag cag gis lha mchod pa'i rtags 'di'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / lhas
mngon sum du smras te skyed shing gi yal ga chod cig dang / 'dod pa thams cad 'byung ngo / /zhes bsgo'o/ /de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / btung ba zhim po byung ngo / /de
nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa thams cad byung nas de dag kun gyis tshim par zos so/ /de nas yang yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / gos rnam pa
sna tshogs byung ngo / /de nas yal ga gcig bcad pa dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs byung ste khal thams cad longs so/ /de nas nyes tshol la sogs
pa thams cad der lhags te snga ma'i yal ga bcad pa las rin po che sna tshogs khal longs pa mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /snga ma 'di dag gis yal ga las kyang
rin po che chog par rnyed na/ shing 'di'i rtsa ba phyung na ni/ rin po che sna tshogs mang du rnyed do snyam bsams nas shing gi rtsa ba rko bar gzas so/ /de nas legs tshol mi
dga' ste smras pa/ bdag cag ni/ phongs te/ srog dang bral ba las shing 'dis bdag cag srog gsod \?\ kyi/ khyod shing 'di ma gcod cig ces smras na/ nyes tshol ma
nyan te shing gi rtsa ba bcad do/ /de nas legs tshol yang mthong mi 'dod par khal dang bcas pa song ba'i 'og tu shing gi rtsa ba nas srin po lnga brgya byung ste nyes tshol dang /
tshong pa kun zos so/ /kun dga' bo/ de'i tshe de'i dus na legs tshol de ni/ da ltar nga yin no/ /de'i pha de ni/ da ltar nga'i yab zas gtsang ma yin no/ /de'i ma de ni/ da
ltar nga'i yu ma lha mdzes ma yin no/ /nyes tshol ni/ da ltar gyi lha sbyin 'di yin te/ kun dga' bo/ lha sbyin gyis de ltar 'ba' zhig nga la gnod par ma zad de/ rnyed pa
dang / grags pa'i phyir skye ba thams cad du nga la gnod pa byas na/ ngas phan pa'i chos bstan te phan par byas kyang lha sbyin ni/ nga la dgrar 'dzin to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis
de skad ces gsungs nas 'khor mang po rnams rjes su yi rang ste mngon par dga'o/ /legs tshol dang nyes tshol gyi le'u ste sum cu gnyis pa'o// //rgyal po dge
don gyi le'u/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so//
de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos lha sbyin gyis thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la gnod pa bya bar bsams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni/ lha sbyin
dang / sgra gcan 'dzin gnyis la mi 'dra ba med par dgongs te/ rtag tu de la thugs brtse bar mthong ste bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun
dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /lha sbyin 'dis dus 'di nyid na nga la gnod pa byas par ma zad do/ skye ba gzhan du yang nga la gnod sems bskyed do/ /dge slong dag the
tshom du gyur nas kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /lha sbyin 'dis skye ba gzhan dag na bcom ldan 'das la gnod pa ji ltar bgyis nas gsol
pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med/ tshad med/ dpag tu
med| bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i pha rol na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po rin chen go cha zhes bya ba/ rgyal phran lnga brgya la dbang byed pa zhig byung ngo / /de la btsun mo dang /
pho brangs slas lnga brgya snyed yod kyang bu med de/ nyi zla'i lha la sogs te lha thams cad la gsol ba byas nas lo mang du lon yang bu med pas mi dga' bar gyur te 'di snyam du
bsams so/ /bdag la bu ni/ gcig kyang med kyi/ de'u re tshe zad pas rgyal phran lnga brgya yang gcig la gcig mi nyan te thams cad 'khrugs nas yul ma bde bar 'gyur
ro snyam nas sems khong du chud de lag pa 'gram pa la brten nas 'dug pa las/ de'i tshe na lha zhig rgyal po'i bsam pa shes nas rmi lam du rgyal po la 'di skad ces
bsgo'o| |pho brang gi phyi rol tshal gyi nang na drang srong gnyis shig yod de/ gcig gi lus gser gyi mdog tu 'dug gi /de'i gan du song la gsol ba thob cig dang / bur
skye bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgo ma thag tu gnyid log pa las sad nas drang srong gnyis gang na 'dug pa tshol du song ste drang srong de dang phrad nas bdag la rgyal po'i rigs
'tshob pa med kyi/ khyod bdag gi rigs su skyes te rigs sobs shig ces gsol ba btab nas drang srong des kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /drang srong gcig gis
kyang bdag kyang khyod kyi rigs su skye bar bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po rab tu dga' nas khyod kyang bdag gi rigs su skye bar shog cig ces smras so/ /de nas rgyal po
phyir logs nas dus phyi zhig na drang srong gser gyi mdog can de tshe'i dus byas nas btsun mo chen mo'i mngal du skyes te/ bud med mkhas pas bu yod par shes nas bu phor
shes te bdag la nges par bu pho yod do/ /zhes rgyal po la smras nas rgyal pos kyang btsun mo'i rim gro bskyed do/ /zla ba dgu tshang nas bu khye'u gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing
gar 'dug pa/ mtshan dang ldan pa zhig btsas so/ /rgyal po rab tu dga' nas btsas ston byas te mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas bu'i ming yang dge don du btags so/ /
de nas yang btsun mo gcig kyang sems can dang ldan par gyur to/ /drang srong gcig shos kyang tshe'i dus byas nas btsun mo de'i mngal du skyes so/ /de nas yang btsas ston
byas te mtshan mkhan gyis mtshan bltas nas khye'u'i ming sdig don du btags so/ /rgyal po bu la byams shing sdug pas/ bu 'dug pa'i gnas dbyar dgun dang / ston
dpyid so sor byas te bags kyis cher skyes nas rig pa bco brgyad la sogs te gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas par gyur to/ /phyis dge don
gyis rgyal po la gsol te/ bdag phyi rol tu 'chag cing ltad mo bltar 'gro'o/ /zhes bya ba dang / de'i pha mas kyang bu 'chag tu 'gro'o/ /zhes lam srung phyag dar byed du
bcug ste rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgrengs nas me tog gis gtor te bdug pa dang / spos kyis bdug pa la sogs pa yo lang bshams nas dge don glang po che rin po che
sna bdun gyis brgyan pa la bskyon te dril bsgrags/ rnga brdungs/ rol mo dang sil snyan dkrol te skye bo brgya stong snyed kyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol du dong ngo / /yul
mi thams cad lam gyi g.yas g.yon na khang bu brtsegs pa'i steng nas mig mi 'dzum par lta zhing / 'di'i byin dang gzi brjid ni/ tshangs pa dang 'dra'o/ /zhes bsgrags so/
de nas song song ba las mu to bdag gcig gos hrul po gyon zhing snod chag pa thogs te cung zad bslang ngo / /zhes 'bod pa dge don gyis thos nas de dag la khyed ci'i phyir
'di ltar nyon mongs shing sdug ces dris so/ /de dag las kha cig ni/ 'di skad du/ bdag cag la pha ma dang / phu nu dang / bu smad dang / gnyen bshes ma mchis pas
sdug go /zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag yun ring du nad kyis btab pas mi sos te dug go /zhes zer ro/ /de la kha cig ni/ bdag cag bag ma byas pas chom
pos bcom ste ci yang mi bdog pas slong mo byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas mchi ma dku ste song ngo / /de nas yang ya zad cig na shan pa dag
cig srog chags bsad nas bags pa bshu ba dang / bsnyal gtubs bdag mthong ngo / /dge don gyis e ma'o 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/ bdag cag gi pha mes rgyud kyis 'di
'dra ba'i gsod pa'i las byed de/ 'di ma byas na mi 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /de la dge don ngo mtshar du gyur nas lta mi 'dod par song ngo / /de nas yang pha zad phyin pa dang zhing pa
dag cig zhing rmos te/ zhing rmos pa'i shul na srin bu mang du byung ba la bya mang po dang / sprul gdug pa dag 'thu zhing za ba mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris pa na/ bdag cag
ni| zhing rmos te sa rlogs pa'i shul du sa bon btab na phyis mang du skyes te/ des 'tshe zhing rgyal po'i dpya yang 'bul lo/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don de la yang ngo mtshar du
gyur nas pha zad song ba dang / rngon pa bya rgya bres pa dang / rnyi btsugs nas bya rnams bshor ba dang / sems can dag bya rgya dang / rnyis zin nas lus rdeb cing 'then kyang ma
shor te| snying rje ba'i skad phyung nas shin tu 'jigs skrag pa dag mthong nas khyod ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis 'di 'dra ba'i gsod
pa'i las byed pas 'tsho'o/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de skad ces smras pa thos nas shin tu yi mug ste yang pha zad song ba dang / nya ba dag nya rgyas nya bcus nas mang du zin
te thang bu la phung por spungs nas da dung yang 'gul ba dag mthong nas 'di dag ci byed ces dris na/ bdag cag kyang rgyud kyis las gzhan mi byed kyi/ 'di ltar nya bshor
zhing 'tsho bar byed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis 'di lta bu dag mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /sems can 'di dag ni/ dbul phongs pas bgo ba dang bza'
ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las gsod pa la sogs pa byed de/ 'di dag ni/ tshe 'phos ma thag tu ngan song gsum du ltung ste mun pa nas mun par 'gro zhing thar
pa'i dus med do snyam du bsams nas phyir khyim du 'ongs te nyin mtshan du de sems shing mi dga' nas pha'i drung du song ste pha la yab/ bdag la gsol pa zhig mchis
kyi| gnong zhig ces smras so/ /phas kyang bu/ khyod ci zer/ khyod smras pa bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras so/ /yab/ bdag sngon phyi rol tu 'chag tu mchis pa las mi mang po
gos dang zas kyi phyir thams cad nyon mongs te/ gcig la gcig gsod pa dang / rdzun dang / dbang za ba dang / mi dge ba'i las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid pa mthong nas de dag la
sbyin pa bgyi bar bsams kyi/ yab kyi bang mdzod chen po las brel cing phongs pa dag gi phyir yid bzhin du spyod du gnong zhig /phas smras pa/ ngas rin po che dang / bang mdzod mang
du bsags pa thams cad khyod kyi phyir byas par zad na/ ci'i phyir khyod zer ba bzhin du mi nyan zhes smras so/ /de nas dge don gyis phas gnang ba'i lung thob nas yul mi thams cad
la dge don ni/ sbyin pa chen po byed kyi/ thams cad 'dus shing shog cig ces bsgrags so/ /de'i tshe na dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / dbul zhing phongs pa mgon med pa dang / nad
pa la sogs te/ grong khyer gyi phyi rol na lam thog thag tu gang ngo / /de dag kyang dpag tshad brgya dang / nyis brgya dang / sum brgya dang / bzhi brgya dang / lnga brgya dang / dpag tshad
stong gi lam nas 'ongs kha cig ni/ dpag tshad nyis stong / sum stong / bzhi stong / lnga stong dang / dpag tshad khri'i bar nas lhags te sprin bzhin du 'dus nas thams cad la yid
bzhin du sbyin pa ni/ gos 'dod pa la gos/ zas 'dod pa la zas rin po che gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+ya dang / mu sar gal ba dang / bzhon pa dang / theg pa dang / khyogs
dang / skyed mos tshal dang / zhing dang rkang 'gro la sogs te yid bzhin du sbyin par byas so/ /de ltar sbyin pa la zhugs te yun ring zhig lon pa dang /
bang mdzod sum cha gcig zad nas mdzod srung gis rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /sras kyis bang mdzod las sbyin pa bgyis nas sum cha ni zad pas/ sum gnyis tsam
las ma lus na/ phan tshun du 'drul ba'i skyes dang / tshong zong ci las bgyi dgongs shig ces smras so/ /nga ni/ sras 'di la byams pas ngo mi ldog gis /bang mdzod stongs kyang
bla'o| |zhes smras so/ /de nas yang ring zhig lon pa dang bang mdzod sum gnyis ni/ zad/ sum cha tsam lus pa dang / mdzod srung gis yang rgyal po la da ni/ bang mdzod sum gnyis
tsam ni zad/ sum cha tsam las ma lus na/ phan tshun skyes bskur ba dang / tshong zong ci las bgyi zhes smras so/ /rgyal pos de la bsgo ba/ nga'i sras sdug ches te ngo mi ldog
pas smra mi phod kyi/ khyod kyis thabs ci legs su byos la brel cing mi khom pa ltar bsnyad thogs shig /mdzod srung gis rgyal po las lung thob nas mdzod sgo bcad de don
gnyer du song ngo / /de nas slong ba dag dge don gyi thad du lhags nas bar 'ga' ni/ mdzod srung mi rnyed de mdzod sgo mi phyed/ gal te mdzod srung 'ongs na yang yid bzhin du
mi ster bas/ dge don gyis 'di snyam du bsams so/ /'di ltar gyur pa 'di ni/ mdzod srung gis thugs mi thub pas yab kyi man ngag 'ongs kyi/ yong yang bus ni/ pha'i mdzod
stongs par bya ba mi rigs kyi/ bdag gis da thabs ci zhig byas na rin po che yid bzhin du rnyed de/ skye bo mang po la phan 'dogs par 'gyur snyam bsams nas mi dag la 'di
skad ces dris so/ /'jig rten na las ci zhig byas na nor dbyig mang du rnyed cing zad mi shes par 'gyur zhes dris pa dang / kha cig ni/ zhing cher rmos na nor dbyig mang por
'gyur zhes zer ro/ kha cig ni/ rkang 'gro spel te spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed do/ /zhes zer ro/ /kha cig ni/ lam ring por tshong spogs byas na nor mang du rnyed ces zer ro/
kha cig ni/ rgya mtshor zhugs te nor bu rin po che blangs na rin po che mang du 'gyur ro/ /zhes zer ro/ /dge don gyis de dag gis smras pa thos nas zhing rmo ba dang / rkang 'gro spel
ba dang / lam ring por tshong la 'gro ba ni/ nga'i cha ma yin gyi/ rgya mtshor 'jug pa 'ba' zhig nga'i cha yin no/ /zhes smras nas rgya mtshor 'jug go snyam du bsams te pha ma la
'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgya mtsho nas rin po che mang du blangs te dbul phongs pa la sbyin pa yid bzhin du bgyi'o/ /bdag rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchir gnong
zhig ces smras so/ /de'i pha mas de skad ces smras pa thos nas 'khams te bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /'jig rten na dbul phongs pa dag ni/ blo
med de| lus srog dang bsngos nas 'gro bar byed do/ /khyod cis phongs na de lta bur sems te/ khyod sbyin pa byed 'dod na khyim na yod pa'i nor thams cad sbyin par khyos
shig /rgya mtshor ni/ 'gror mi rung ste rgya mtsho'i nang na chu rlabs dang / dpa' klong 'khyil pa dang / chu srin dang / klu gdug pa dang / srin mo dang / ri chu'i mdog can
la sogs pa shin tu yang ba'i bgegs mang du yod pas thar par dka' na/ khyod cis phongs te srog dang bsngo bar byed/ /'di la ni/ nyan pa med kyi/ ma sems par 'dug
cig ces bsgo'o/ /dge don gyis de skad ces bsgo ba thos nas bsam pa bzhin dum grub pas yi dam bcas te/ bsam pa 'di ma grub kyi bar du pha ma'i mdun du sa
la khas bub tu nyal te mi ldang ngo snyam bsams nas yab yum gyis mkhyen par mdzod cig /bdag ni/ bsam pa bzhin ma grub kyi bar du khas bub tu nyal ba 'di las
mi ldang ngo / /zhes smras so/ /de nas pha ma mi dga' ste gnyen bshes dang bgros nas rgya mtsho'i nang na dgegs yang ba mang du yod pa'i gtam yang byas/ bdag kyang
rmongs pas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du lha kun la mchod de/ khyod lta zhig nga'i bur skyes na nged mdor bar zan zo zhig ces zhag gcig zhag gnyis nas zhag drug gi bar du tshig
rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gros btab kyang ma nyan te/ sngar ji skad smras pa las ma ldog go /pha ma sdangs nas yang 'di skad ces bgros so/ /bdag gi bu 'di thog ma nas da tsam
gyi bar du bya ba bsam pa mthar ma grub kyi bar du mi gtong bas/ rgya mtshor btang na gal te na phyir ldog kyang srid kyi/ ma btang na zhag bdun lon nas 'phral du bye bral
byed de| da ni/ gtang dgos so snyam bgros nas bu'i drung du song ste lag pa nas bzung nas bu longs la zan zo zhig /yid bzhin du 'gro bar gnang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang
dge don yang langs te bza' ba zos/ btung ba 'thungs so/ /de nas phyi rol tu byung ste mi mang po la kho bo rgya mtshor rin po che len du 'gro'o/ /khyed su 'gror dga' ba rnams
kyang 'grogs te 'dong gi /ded dpon yang kho bos bya la/ yo byad kyang kho bos sbyar ro/ /zhes bgrags so/ /de'i tshe na yul de na tshong pa lnga brgya snyed kyis bdag cag kyang
rgya mtshor rin po che len du mchi'o/ /zhes thams cad 'dus nas chas so/ /de'i tshe yul de na tshong ba ded dpon rgan po zhig sngon chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma phyin pa zhig
yod de| rgyal bu nyid de'i gan du song nas 'di skad ces smras so/ kho bo rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du 'gro dgos kyi/ khyod kyang chas shig
ces bsgo ba dang / ded dpon gyis bdag ni/ rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gnyis kyis kyang mi mthong bas 'gro mi nus so/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas rgyal bu pha'i thang
du song ste rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /ded dpon rgan po zhig mchis pa sngon chad kyang rgya mtshor lan du ma zhig phyin te rgya mtsho'i rgyus mchis kyi/ bdag rgya mtshor
mchis pa'i sa mkhan du bka' stsol cig ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po nyid ded dpon long ba'i gan du song nas ded dpon long ba la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal bu
rgya mtshor 'gro 'dod de/ nged kyis 'gror mi rung ba'i gros re lta zhig btab na ma nyan gyi/ rgyal bu rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i sa mkhan du khyod song zhig ces bka' stsal pa dang /
ded dpon gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bdag rgas 'khogs pa'i steng du mig gnyis kyang long mod kyi/ da rgyal pos bka' stsal pa na bka' mi gcog go/ zhes gsol
to| |de nas rgyal po pho brang du 'ongs nas nga'i bu dang rgya mtshor 'gro phod pa su yod ces dris pa dang / rgyal bu sdig don yang bdag phu bo'i g.yog tu mchi'o/ /zhes gsol to/ /
rgyal pos bsam pa/ gzhan song ba bas nu bo song na phan snyam nas nu bo yang 'gror gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal bus gser srang sum stong zhig phyung ste srang stong ni/ gru'i zong du byas/
srang nyis stong ni/ 'phral du dgos pa'i yo byad du sbyar te chas nas rgyal po dang btsun mo la sogs pa thams cad kyis bskyal to/ /de nas rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin nas grur zhugs
te thag pa bdun gyis brtod nas rlung phyogs dang sbyar te 'gro ba'i tshong pa rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/ /rgya mtsho'i nang na bgegs rnam pa sna tshogs yod de/ snga phyir 'dong ba ni/
rab tu yang mang na/ phyir 'khor ba ni/ nyung rab bo/ /de las the tshom za ba la de na phyir dengs shig /gal te lus dang srog la mi lta/ pha ma dang / bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen
bshes dag la yang ma chags te rin po che'i gling du phyin nas phyir yang bde bar 'khor na/ bu tsha rabs bdun tshun chad nor gyis mi brel bar 'gyur ro/ /zhes bsgrags nas thag
pa gcig bcad do/ /de bzhin du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du nyin re lan re de skad ces bsgos nas thag pa re re bcad de rlung phyogs su bab pa la g.yor shing bsgrengs te mgyogs khyad
mda' bzhin du song ngo / /de nas rin po che'i gling du phyin nas rgyal bu rin po che brtag pa la shin tu mkhas pas/ rin po che bzang ngan dang / mang nyung gi tshad kyang bstan nas
so so nas rin po che tshol lo/ /ded dpon dang gnyis gru chung gcig gi nang du zhugs nas tshong pa phal rnams der bor ro/ /de nas song song ba
las ded dpon gyis ni/ ri dkar po zhig yod pa'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes dris so/ /rgyal bus kyang de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de ni/ dngul gyi
ri yin no/ /zhes zer ro/ /de nas yang song song ba las/ da ni/ ri sngon po zhig snang ba'i rigs na mthong ngam zhes dris na/ de 'dra ba zhig snang ngo / /zhes smras pa
dang / de ni/ bai DUR+ya'i ri yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas yang song song ba las/ da ni/ ri ser po zhig snang ba'i rigs so/ /zhes dris na/ ri ser po 'dra ba zhig
snang ngo / /zhes smras pa dang / de ni/ gser gyi ri yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas gser gyi ri'i drung du phyin te gser gyi bye ma'i steng du 'dug nas ded dpon des
'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag ni/ rgas zhom ste da ni/ 'gro mi phod pas/ da 'di nyid du tshe'i dus byas par 'gyur gyi/ khyod 'di nas song zhig dang / mdun na rin po
che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig dang phrad pa'i rigs kyi/ gal te mkhar sgo bcad cing 'dug na/ sgo drung na rdo rje'i gtun zhig yod pa'i rigs kyi/ rdo rje'i gtun gyis mkhar
bsgo rdungs shig dang / nang nas lha mo lnga brgya zhig so so nas rin po che thogs te 'bul du 'ong ngo / /de la lha mo gcig cig kyang rin po che sngon po gcig thogs shing 'bul du
'ong gi /de ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yin no/ /thob ma thag tu ma shor bar dam du zungs shig /bu mo gzhan dag gi nor bu rin po che yang longs shig /dbang po
rab tu sdoms la de dag dang ma smra zhig /bdag ni/ nyam thag ste 'dir tshe 'phos nas drin dran par gyis la 'di nyid du rus bu sbas te song zhig ces bsgo ma thag tu tshe'i dus
byas so| |de nas ded dpon gyi rus bu gser gyi bye ma'i nang du sbas nas bsgo ba bzhin du song nas ring po ma lon par rin po che sna bdun gyi mkhar zhig gi drung du phyin to/ /sgo
yang dam du bcad pa las drung na rdo rje'i gtun 'dug pa blangs te sgo brdungs pa dang / sgo yang rang bye nas lha mo lnga brgya so so nas rin po che thogs te 'bul bar byed do/ /nang
gi lha mo snga ma gcig gi lag na nor bu sngon po zhig thogs te smras pa bzhin blangs nas gos kyi tha mar phur te de ma thag tu phyir log go /rgyal bu dang bral ba'i 'og tu rgyal bu
sdig don gyis tshong ba rnams la rin po che mang du longs shig ces byas pas/ tshong pa rnams kyis mang du blangs nas rin po che mang bas/ gru yang bar 'ga' ni/ nu ba/ bar
'ga' ni/ byung nas rgyal bu dge don 'ba' zhig ni/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che yod pas chur ma nub bo/ /rgyal bu sdig don skrag nas dge
don la bdag la yang skyobs shig ces smras pa dang / sdig don yang khrid de rgya mtsho brgal to/ /de nas skam sar phyin pa dang sdig don gyis phu bo la 'di skad ces
smras so| |bdag cag spun gnyis pha ma dang bral te rgya mtshor rin po che len du dong ba las ma stas te rin po che dang bral nas lag pa stong par khyim du 'gro ba ni/ ngo
che'o| |rgyal bu dge don rang bzhin gyis drang bas/ nu bo la bdag cag gis rin po che thob na ci'i phyir ngo tsha zhes smras so/ /rin po che ji lta bu zhig rnyed bdag la
ston cig ces smras pa dang / phu bos rin po che bkrol te nu bo la bstan to/ /nu bos rin po che mthong nas 'di snyam du bsams so/ /bdag gi pha ma yang bur
'dra ba las/ phu bo la byams te bdag la mi byams pa'i steng du nga gnyis 'grogs te rin po che len du song ba las/ phu bos ni/ rin po che rnyed kyi bdag gis
ni| ci yang ma rnyed pas/ da khyim du 'ongs na bdag la de bas kyang mi byams par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis phu bo gnyid log pa'i tshe bsad la nor bu rin po che khyer
te 'gro'o/ /gal te pha mas dris na/ phu bo ni/ rgya mtsho'i nang du nub bo/ /zhes bya'o bsams nas phu bo la 'di skad ces smras so/ /bdag cag spun gnyis rin po che thogs
te gnyis ka gcig car nyal ba mi rigs kyi/ res kyis nyal la mel tshe bya'o/ /zhes smras pa dang / phu bos kyang de bzhin du bya'o/ /zhes smras te/ spun gnyis res kyis
mel tshe byed do/ /de nas nub gcig phu bo sngar mel tshe byed pa las mel tshe thun 'khor bas kyang ring zhig langs su ma btub bo/ /phu bos yun ring du mel tshe byas nas
nu po gdod langs te phu bo yun ring du 'dug pas gnyid bro nas gnyid log pa'i 'og tu tshal gyi nang nas tsher ma ring po gnyis shig blangs nas phu bo gnyid log pa'i
mig tu tsher ma re re btsugs te rin po che khyer nas bros so/ /dge don sngangs nas chom po byung ngo / /zhes bos na cang mi zer te/ de nas shing gi lha mo zhig gis khyod kyi
chom po ni/ sdig don yin no/ /zhes smras so/ /de nas dge don mig na ba ma bzod nas 'bod 'grogs te gog cing song song ba las yul shi ba de dang nye bar phyin nas
ba lang rdzib lang lnga brgya tsam 'tsho ba dang phrad do/ /ba lang de'i nang nas khyu mchog cig gis rgyal bu ldongs pa mthong nas rgyal bu'i mig la lces bldags so/ /de nas pa
lang kun kyang der 'dus pas rdzi'u yang der 'ongs na/ mi zhig sa la 'gre ba mthong nas drung du brtags na/ mig tu tsher ma zug pa mthong nas tsher
ma gnyis dal gyis phyung ste gnas su khrid do/ /de nas 'o ma dang snum gyis rma kha bskus nas kha zas kyis bsnyod de gsos so/ /de nas phyi zhig na rma yang bags kyis sos
nas da ni/ 'gro'o/ /zhes byas pa dang / ba lang rdzis ma btang ngo / /de nas yang phyi zhig na rma yang legs par sos nas da ni/ grong khyer 'o nir 'gro'o/ /zhes byas nas mthar
gyis grong khyer dang nye bar bskyal te bdag la rol mo'i cha byad kim zhes bya ba byin cig ces byas pa dang / rdzi'us rol mo'i cha byad kim zhig byin no/ /de nas rgyal bus rol mo
byed cing glu dang tshig snyan par sbyar te blangs pas thams cad de la nyan te kun gyis zas dang skom bskyal bas/ de na sbrang po lnga brgya yang rgyal pu la brten te gsos so/ /
phyi zhig na rgyal po de'i skyed mos tshal srung ba zhig der 'ongs nas rol mo snyan pa thos pa dang / de la dga' ste khyod nga'i skyed mos tshal du rol mo byed cing skyed mos tshal
yang srung na mi nus sam zhes dris na/ bdag mig long bas mi nus so/ /zhes smras so/ /des smras pa/ khyod mig mi mthong yang bla'i/ shing gi kha nas the gu la dril bu
btags te bya'i skad byung na/ the gu drangs pas chog gi /nga'i skyed mos tshal du 'dong ngo / /zhes smras nas khrid do/ /rgyal bu de'i tshal na 'dug cing rol mo byed do/ /de'i tshe na sdig
don phyir yul du 'ongs pa dang / rgyal pos khyod kyis phu bo dang tshong pa gzhan dag ga re zhes dris na/ bdag gi phu bo dge don dang / tshong pa gzhan ni/ rin po che mang du rnyed
nas gru dang bcas su chur nub bo/ /bdag ni/ rkyal 'tshal bas bdag 'ba' zhig thar ro/ /zhes smras pa dang / rgyal po yab dang btsun mo gnyis 'khams nas sa la 'gyel
to| |yul na mi 'khod pa gzhan dag kyang de skad ces thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te mya ngan gyis brnangs so/ /rgyal po yab dang btsun mo yang mya ngan gyis yid gdungs nas sdig don
khyod kyang phu bo dang lhan cig log na ci nyes zhes bsgo'o/ /rgyal bu dge don 'dug pa'i tshe bya ngang pa gcig gsos pa de la rgyal pos 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ /rgyal bu dge don
rgya mtshor rin po che len du song ba las rgya mtshor nub ste dge don dag ces zer gyi/ khyod rtog cing tshol du song zhig ces bsgos nas yi ge bris te mgul du btags nas song ngo //
de nas bya ngang pa kun tu 'phur zhing tshol tshol ba las skyed mos tshal de na rgyal bu'i skad grag nas der babs te bltas na/ rgyal ba de na 'dug pa dang phrad do/ /rgyal bus
kyang ngang pa'i skad shes pas mgul nas yi ge bkrol te klog tu bcug go /de nas yi ge'i lan bris nas sdig don gyis ji ltar mig tu tsher
mas btsugs te bros pa yang zhib tu sbring ngo / /de'i tshe na rgyal po li shi bar de la bu mo bzang mo 'jig rten na dkon pa zhig yod de/ bu mo de skyed mos tshal du 'chag tu song
song ba las rgyal bu dge don de na 'dug pa dang phrad nas rgyal bu dge don skra ni/ 'dzings/ gdong la ni/ dri mas gang / gos ngan pa gyon zhing shing drung na 'dug pa
mthong nas bu mo de la chags te phan tshun gar yang ma song bar de'i drung du 'dug ste gtam byas so/ /dro la bab nas rgyal pos bu mo bos na/ bdag gi 'tshal ma
'dir skyol cig phar mi mchi'o zhes mchi'o/ /de nas rgyal pos yang zan bskyal ba dang / bu mos rgyal bu la bdag cag gnyis lhan cig zan bza'o/ /zhes byas
pa dang / rgyal bus bdag ni/ long ba sprang po lags pas/ rgyal po'i sras mo dang lhan cig 'tshal ma 'tshal du mi rung ngo / /gal te rgyal pos gsan na bdag la
