'gyur| |de yi 'og tu thub mchog go /dam chos sdug bsngal kun spong zhing / /zhi ba yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i/ /gsung gis ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ /me tog mdzes pa brgyus pa
yi| |skyed mos tshal du de yi 'khor/ /dpag tshad brgya khyon gang ba dag /yang dag 'du ba kho nar 'gyur/ /de nas mi dbang rgyal po dung / /grags pa chen pos thos nas ni/ /sbyin pa grangs
med byas nas kyang / /rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par 'gyur/ /rgyal po stong phrag bzhi dang ni/ /brgyad cu dag gis mdun bdar te/ /khyim nas des par byung nas ni/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gro
bar 'gyur/ /byams pa'i yab kyang de bzhin du/ /de yi tshad dang mnyam pa yi/ /bram ze rnams kyis mdun bdar nas/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de nas de tshe khyim bdag ni/ /
nor bzang tshogs ni rnam grags pa/ /chos kyi bdag nyid stong dag gis/ /bskor nas rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ /dung gi bud med rin po che/ /sa ga zhes ni rnam grags pa/ /bud med
stong phrag bzhi dang ni/ /brgyad cu dag gis mdun bdar te/ /de yi 'og tu mngon byung nas/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi tshe na byams pa yi/ /bstan pa la ni srog chags
dag /stong phrag dang ni brgya phrag rnams/ /rab tu 'byung bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'og tu thugs rje can/ /ston pa byams pa rkang gnyis mchog /
'khor lo rnam par gzigs nas ni/ /shAkya seng+ge thub pa ste/ /gtso bo skyob par mdzad pa po/ /dam pa'i chos dbyings gzigs gyur pa/ /'jig rten mgon pos 'di dag kun/ /
thar pa'i lam de bskyed nas kyang / /don gyis nga yi bstan la btang / /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan pa dan dang / /dri dang phreng ba byug pa yis/ /shAkya thub la mchod nas ni/ /
nga yi bstan la lhags pa yin/ /gur gum chu yis gdab pa dang / /tsan+dan gyi ni byug pa yis/ /shAkya thub pa'i mchod rten la/ /mchod nas nga yi bstan la lhags/ /de
tshe sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ /dge 'dun la yang skyabs song zhing / /dge ba'i las kyang byas nas ni/ /nga yi bstan la lhags pa yin/ /shAkya seng+ge'i bstan pa la/ /bslab
gzhi yang dag blangs nas su/ /ji ltar gsung bzhin bsgrubs nas ni/ /nga yi bstan la lhags pa yin/ /dge 'dun la yang chos gos dang / /zhal zas dang ni btung ba dang /
snyun gsos sna tshogs sbyin pa rnams/ /phul nas nga yi bstan la lhags/ /bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang / /de bzhin zla gcig tshes brgyad dang / /cho 'phrul wa yi zla ba la/ /
yan lag brgyad legs mnyam bzhag cing / /bsnyen gnas gso sbyong byas nas ni/ /nga yi bstan la lhags so zhes/ /don 'di rab tu gsung bar 'gyur/ /de yi nyan thos rnams kyang ni/ /
cho 'phrul gsum gyis 'dul bar 'gyur/ /de tshe de dag thams cad ni/ /zag zad 'grogs na bde bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'dus pa dang po ni/ /nyan thos srid pa bcad gyur pa/ /dung phyur phrag
dgu bye phrag drug /tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de yi 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/ /nyon mongs 'ching ba las grol ba'i/ /dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag bzhi/ /tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung
par 'gyur/ /de yi 'dus pa gsum pa ni/ /sems zhi rnam par grol gyur pa/ /dung phyur phrag dgu bye phrag gnyis/ /tshang ba'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur/ /chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas/ /
lha dang mi rnams rnam btul te/ /nyan thos dge 'dun thabs cig tu/ /grong du bsod snyoms spyod la rgyu/ /de nas rtog ldan dga' lta yi/ /grong khyer der ni gshegs pa na/ /grong khyer
mchog tu man+dA ra'i/ /me tog char chen 'bab par 'gyur/ /thub pa grong der gshegs pa la/ /lha yis me tog 'thor bar 'gyur/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dag dang / /brgya byin sum cu
rtsa gsum dbang / /tshangs pa lha sogs thabs cig tu/ /de la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /lha yi bu ni mthu chen gyis/ /ut+pal pad+ma ku mu ta/ /pad+ma dkar po dri zhim dang / /a ga ru dang
tsan+dan dang / /de bzhin lha rdzas phreng ba dang / /lha rdzas gos kyang 'thor par 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon de grong khyer gyi/ /mchog tu gshegs pa mthong nas
ni| |shing bal 'dab ltar 'jam pa yi/ /sa der gding brgya cher 'ding / /de dag lam gar phreng ba ni/ /sna tshogs mdzes pa rnam par 'grem/ /lha yi bu ni mthu chen dang / /mi rnams yid
ni rab dang ba/ /gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang / /spos dang phreng ba byug pa dang / /rol mo sgra snyan bsgrags pa yis/ /ston pa la ni mchod par 'gyur/ /brgya byin mig stong
lha rnams kyi/ /rgyal po bde sogs bdag po de/ /rab mgu thal mo sbyar nas ni/ /'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed/ /skyes bu cang shes khyod la 'dud/ /skyes mchog khyed
la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zag mchog gyur bcom ldan 'das/ /skye rgu la ni thugs brtser mdzod/ /de yi tshe na lha yi bu/ /mthu chen bdud ces bya ba 'byung / /de yang thal mo rab
sbyar nas/ /'jig rten mgon la bstod par byed/ /tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor cing / /tshangs pas kyang ni mdun bdar te/ /tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni sgrog bzhin du/ /dam
pa'i chos ni gsung bar 'gyur/ /zag zad nyes pa rnams bral zhing / /srid pa'i 'ching ba rab spangs pa'i/ /dgra bcom rnams kyis sa 'di ni/ /thams cad kun tu gang bar
'gyur| |lha dang mi dang dri za dang / /gnod sbyin dang ni srin po klu/ /mthu chen rnams ni mgu gyur nas/ /ston la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/ /gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la/ /tshangs
par spyad pa spyod gyur pa/ /de dag gdon mi za bar ni/ /nyon mongs med cing the tshom med/ /gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la/ /tshangs par spyod pa spyod gyur pa/ /de dag gdon mi za bar
ni| |nga yi med cing yongs 'dzin med/ /gser dang dngul la 'dzin med cing / /gnas med chags pa'ang yod pa min/ /gang dag byams pa'i bstan pa la/ /tshangs par spyad pa spyod
gyur pa| |de dag gdon mi za bar ni/ /sred pa'i dra ba bcad pa dang / /bsam gtan rdzogs par byas nas ni/ /dga' dang bde dang yang dag ldan/ /'byung po kun la thugs brtse ba/ /byams
pa rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog /lo ni drug khri dag tu yang / /dam pa'i chos ni ston par 'gyur/ /de na srog chags brgya stong dang / /'bum phrag rnam par 'dren pa ste/ /dam pa'i
chos la btul nas ni/ /de nas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /thub pa chen pos gsungs pa de/ /yongs su mya ngan 'das nas kyang / /de tshe de yi dam chos ni/ /lo khri dag tu gnas par
'gyur| |rgyal ba shAkya thub de la/ /sems ni rab tu dad par gyis/ /des na byams pa rkang gnyis mchog /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/ /de phyir sangs rgyas chos dag
dang / /dge 'dun tshogs kyi mchog la ni/ /sems ni rab tu dad gyis dang / /don chen rab tu 'grub par 'gyur/ /thugs rje che ldan de lta bu'i/ /
byams pa rkang gnyis mchog gyur pa/ /de tshe mnyes par byas nas ni/ /de nas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur/ /ya mtshan 'di dag thos gyur cing / /'byor pa mi nyung mthong
mdzad de/ /nag po'i rigs kyang dad 'gyur na/ /mkhas pa su zhig dad mi 'gyur/ /de phyir 'di na bdag nyid che/ /'dod cing bdag la legs 'dod pas/ /sangs rgyas
bstan pa dran bzhin du/ /dam pa'i chos la gus par bya/ /'phags pa byams pa lung bstan pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra
dang / lots+tsha ba ban+d+he dpal brtsegs rak+Shi tas bsgyur/ /
